TopicTitle: I can't put addons in the correct folders because of the new .20 layout

Articles.Content: I'm trying to put in MechJeb and KAS and a hundred other mods but It doesn't work anymore!
Now you have to add the folders under the "GAME DATA" folder, instead of going to Plugins/Mods folders.

Now you have to add the folders under the "GAME DATA" folder, instead of going to Plugins/Mods folders.

This. This took me forever to figure out on my own when I installed ISA Mapsat.

If the addon has been updated for 0.20: /KSP/GAME DATA/

If not, then the traditional /KSP/plugins/ and /KSP/parts/ folders.
